roleset.name: to commit theft of a vehicle from its users
roleset.note: CARJACK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'carjack' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 10.5. (from carjack.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: In pretrial motions, prosecutors said Wilbourn carjacked a vehicle from Desric Ivory only a few minutes after the shooting

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: The man then carjacked a 65-year-old woman and drove her 2011 Dodge Caliber through a closed garage door
